options.name: Frenzied Spirit
options.description: When you take damage while below 10 health, you roll a resilience check. If the result is less than a 8, you enter a Frenzy which grants you a bonus dice on attack, endurance and might checks but a penalty dice on defense checks for the next minute. At the start of each of your successive turns, roll a resilience check: on a 2 or lower, you gain the maddened condition.

options.name: Fear Unburdened
options.description: When you have morale, you are immune to the fear condition. Additionally, gain +1 psychic mitigation.

options.name: Pushing the Limit
options.description: Gain +1 skill with endurance and +2 health.

options.name: Reaction : Controlled Frenzy
options.description: You have become skilled in controlling your frenzied rage. In response to taking damage, you may spend up to 5 resolve to intentionally enter a frenzy, gaining 1d4 morale for each spent that last for the next minute or until the frenzy ends.

options.name: Massive Weaponry
options.description: You gain +1 skill with complex melee weapons.

options.name: The Old Way
options.description: You gain +1 skill with simple melee weapons and +1 skill with throwing weapons.

options.name: Action : Savage Strike
options.description: While under the effects of the Frenzy action, you make a savage melee attack, doubling your primary weapon damage.

options.name: Mind Over Matter
options.description: You gain +1 skill with resilience. When you receive a new mental condition, you can delay it taking effect until the end of your next turn.

options.name: Imposing
options.description: You are an imposing figure, especially when you're angry. You gain +1 skill with presence and +1 skill with might.

options.name: Battle Shout
options.description: When you enter a frenzy with the Controlled Frenzy reaction, any ally within a short radius (10 units) gains half of the total morale you generated, lasting for a minute.
